{"step_by_step_thinking": "BCR-ABL transcript detection by quantitative real-time PCR is a standard procedure in diagnosing and monitoring chronic myeloid leukemia. Homebrew assays refer to laboratory-developed tests that are not commercially available. These assays can be designed and optimized according to the specific needs of a laboratory. Therefore, it is possible to get correlated results from homebrew assays if they are properly designed, optimized, and validated.", "answer_choice": "A"}
